title: Requires the commissioner of the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to promulgate rules requiring the use of automatic license plate reader systems at all entrances and exits to state parks

abstracts.abstract: Requires the commissioner of the office of parks, recreation and historic preservation to promulgate rules and regulations requiring the use of automatic license plate reader systems at all entrances and exits to state parks and to assist municipalities in establishing policies and procedures for similar use of such license plate readers.

actions.description: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

related_entities.name: TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
